instructions.start:
Welcome to the **CPT Home Page** setup!

This is a simple static web page that will be deployed using Nginx. No configuration or variables are required.

After deployment, you can access the static page through the assigned URL.
instructions.end:
Congratulations! Your **CPT Home Page** has been successfully deployed.

Visit it at: http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain.

For any updates or modifications to the static content, please contant the creator: luca0gastaldi@gmail.com.

description: A simple static web page served with Nginx.
documentation: For more information, visit the [Bribbo OneClick Repository](https://github.com/Bribbo38/caprover-apps)
